# Generated by `boostdep --cmake accumulators`

# https://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5...3.16)

project(boost_accumulators VERSION "${BOOST_SUPERPROJECT_VERSION}" LANGUAGES CXX)

add_library(boost_accumulators INTERFACE)
add_library(Boost::accumulators ALIAS boost_accumulators)

target_include_directories(boost_accumulators INTERFACE include)

target_link_libraries(boost_accumulators
  INTERFACE
    Boost::array
    Boost::assert
    Boost::circular_buffer
    Boost::concept_check
    Boost::config
    Boost::core
    Boost::fusion
    Boost::iterator
    Boost::mpl
    Boost::numeric_conversion
    Boost::numeric_ublas
    Boost::parameter
    Boost::preprocessor
    Boost::range
    Boost::serialization
    Boost::static_assert
    Boost::throw_exception
    Boost::tuple
    Boost::type_traits
    Boost::typeof
)

if(BUILD_TESTING AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test/CMakeLists.txt")

  add_subdirectory(test)

endif()
